question: __________ and Tata Motors have launched the trial demonstration of the country's first hydrogen fuel cell bus.
explanation: IndianOil Corporation Ltd and Tata Motors have launched the trial demonstration of the country's first hydrogen fuel cell bus. The project is being executed with financial support from the Department of Science & Industrial Research, Ministry of Science & Technology and the Ministry for New and Renewable Energy. The vehicle will be fuelled at the hydrogen dispensing facility at IndianOil.
